items.ja: Has England's Euros triumph given women's club football a boost?
items.en: Has England's Euros triumph given women's club football a boost?
items.text_for_match: Has England's Euros triumph given women's club football a boost? One of the constant refrains throughout England's triumphant run at Euro 2025 – and indeed most women's football matches in recent years – has been how important the success of the Lionesses has been for the growth of the game. But what has been the impact?
